scripts.build: jupyter nbconvert presentation.ipynb --to slides --SlidesExporter.reveal_scroll=False --TagRemovePreprocessor.remove_input_tags remove-input --SlidesExporter.reveal_url_prefix=https://unpkg.com/reveal.js@4.4.0 --template reveal-template
scripts.predeploy: mkdir -p build && cp presentation.slides.html build/index.html && mkdir -p build/images/presentation && cp -r images/presentation build/images
